required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Detection of Cannabis Impairment With an Eye Tracker
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Cannabis on Driver Performance and Eye Movements and Characteristics During Simulated Driving: Feasibility Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Centre for Addiction and Mental Health

clinical_study.source: Centre for Addiction and Mental Health

brief_summary.textblock: Cannabis is one of the widely used psychoactive substances in the world. With increasing legalization, the prevalence of driving under the influence of cannabis will undoubtedly rise. At present, roadside detection of cannabis intoxication is largely dependent on drug recognition experts who rely on changes in eye movements when impaired. In this regard, use of eye trackers can help to detect impairment in drivers. The purpose of the present study is to determine the feasibility of the use of eye trackers in detecting impairment in participants who smoked a cannabis cigarette.

detailed_description.textblock: Participants will attend one study session after determination of eligibility. During this session, they will smoke a cannabis cigarette with 12.5% THC prior to driving a simulator. Driving will be assessed prior to smoking cannabis and at 7 time points after smoking cannabis. Eye tracking measures will also be taken while driving after smoking cannabis. Blood will be drawn for determination of levels of the psychoactive substance THC and its metabolites. Saliva tests, urine tests and subjective tests will also be performed at various times points after smoking cannabis.

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
primary_outcome.description: Measures of eye movement with an eye tracker

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Measures of quick eye movements with an eye tracker

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Measure of where the eye is looking with an eye tracker

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The number of blinks, measured with an eye tracker

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The length of time that blinks last, measured with a eye tracker

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: How fast the blinking is, measured with an eye tracker

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The diameter of pupils while driving, measured with an eye tracker

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in mean speed on the driving simulator
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The speed, in km, while driving a driving simulator

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in standard deviation of speed on the driving simulator
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The amount of variation in speed while driving the driving simulator

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in maximum speed on the driving simulator
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The greatest speed obtained on the driving simulator

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in standard deviation of lateral position on the driving simulator
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The amount of weaving while driving the driving simulator

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in minimum time to collision on the driving simulator
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The time needed to collide with the car in front, while driving the simulator

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 15 minutes, 35 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The number of times a car impacts another car while driving the simulator

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in blood concentrations of delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The levels of the psychoactive component of cannabis, THC, in blood

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in blood concentrations of carboxy-tetrahydrocannabinol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The levels of the inactive metabolite of THC in blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The levels of the active metabolite of THC in blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Detection of THC in saliva

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in number of respirations per minute
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Subjective cannabis effects with a visual analog scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, 5 minutes, 25 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours
secondary_outcome.description: The amount of liking of cannabis from 0 to 100, with 100 being the greatest value

arm_group.description: a 750 mg cannabis cigarette with 12.5% THC
